column1: Cauto Cristo is a municipality and town in the Granma Province of Cuba. It is located on the banks of the Río Cauto
column2: in the western part of the province
column3: bordering the provinces of Holguín and Las Tunas.

column2: the municipality of Cauto Cristo had a population of 21
column3: 159. With a total area of 550 km2 (210 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 38.5/km2 (100/sq mi).
